name: Revenge of the Flies
description:
Revenge of the Flies is a Sidescroller Platformer with Puzzle elements to the gameplay.

Players control a human with a frog-like tongue who uses their power to save as many frogs and defeat as many giant flies as possible throughout the three levels in the game.

The player can use their tongue attack to catch small flies across the levels and can either spit them at the giant flies in order to defeat them or swallow them for an effect such as seeing hidden platforms and adding extra time to the timer. 

The various types of small flies will need to be used in the most effective way possible to allow the player to defeat every giant fly and save every frog.
